Plan: 2 to modify.

Summary by type:
  tables: 1 to modify
  views: 1 to modify

Tables:
  ~ products
    + category (column)

Views:
  ~ expensive_products

DDL to be executed:
--------------------------------------------------

ALTER TABLE products ADD COLUMN category text;

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW expensive_products AS
 SELECT id,
    name,
    price,
    category
   FROM products
  WHERE price > 100::numeric;
